argument.name: stopwhendocked
argument.desc: stop if leader is docked at same

line.comment: * stop when escort stops: Escort probably stops when lead docks or changes environment
* The escort could have stopped because the ship is jumping.

sval.val: stop if leader is docked at same
stop when escort stops: Escort probably stops when lead docks or changes environment
The escort could have stopped because the ship is jumping.
